author: Sharon Gaffney
title: Family of Covid-19 victim urge people to stay home
description: The family of a Dublin man who died after contracting Covid-19, has urged people to stay in their homes to save lives and help prevent the spread of the illness.
content:
The family of a Dublin man who died after contracting Covid-19, has urged people to stay in their homes to save lives and help prevent the spread of the illness.
Michael Glynn, 78, from Tallaght was a father-of-six and a popular taxi driver.
